summary: Investment Banking Summer Analyst with experience in financial modeling (DCF and LBO), valuation, due diligence, and market research; prepared investor presentations and analyzed M&A opportunities in TMT sectors. Proficient in Spanish.

experience.title: Investment Banking Summer Analyst
experience.description: Built discounted cash flow and leveraged buyout financial models to obtain implied valuations of TMT companies. Presented a case study on Evertec, a payments processing company, including potential M&A opportunities to senior members of TMT group. Select Transaction Experience: Sale of Ascensus, Inc. to Genstar Capital and Aquiline Capital Partners. Aided in creation of Investor Presentation materials and due diligence. Potential sale of large media company to sponsor groups for ~$3 billion. Assisted in financial modeling for levered transaction. Prepared comparable company analysis examining precedent transactions and similar opportunities. Potential global expansion of private U.S. based sports entertainment company. Created pitch presentation for client meetings. Compiled extensive market research and provided broad analysis on emerging trends in global sports and media industries.

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Evaluated prospective equity investments for the team. Analyzed potential asset allocation scenarios for high net worth clients.

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Generated leads of potential high net worth clients on both a corporate and private level. Aided in evaluating financial reports and constructing portfolio changes.

education.degree: Bachelor's degree in Psychology, Economics, Markets and Management
Study abroad program: Strategic Behavior in Business; Cross Cultural Management; Business Ethics; Intercultural Interactions
